reviews.text: The staff is very friendly, also at reception and restaurant and they showed us a pretty place to set our tent close to everything and private. At night very quiet and the food we ordered was delicious.

After having a nice hike around the area of Ettelbruck, in the evening we suffered a severe storm.
First they allowed us to have our drinks under their party tent at no extra cost.
Later, when we found out that one of our tents had flattened they graciously provided us with some of their glamping tents with dry bedding free of charge.

You might find a nice spot, but they really went above and beyond and measurably improved our experience.
We booked 2 mobil homes, payed for them and then only used 1. A refund was promised but never received.
Pleasant and calm camping spot. Staff was friendly. Restaurant was nice and cheaper than expected

Highly recommended!! This is a beautiful camping with lots of shady spots to accommodate a large 7.5 metres camper.  We were able to choose our own spot.  From some of the lower camping spots there are amazing views of neighbouring farms and lovely Haflinger ponies in the green hills. Monumental willow trees and other deciduous and coniferous trees provide shade and a really scenic atmosphere of nature, with birds and squirrels nearby. The showers were very clean with good drainage and hot water,  there are many showers to choose from and also toilets are nice and clean and always with toilet paper.
The one thing that was a bit difficult was emptying the grey water tank near the entrance / exit, it can be a tight spot but with a talented driver it was fine!
The outdoor terrace at the bistro restaurant had a very friendly feeling, the wait staff very kind and thoughtful to us and toward our dog ðŸ¥° The food is fresh and the service relatively quick, we didn't wait long for drinks.
.
Thank you so much Camping Ettelbruck for a great stop on our road trip and we might see you again someday ðŸ˜Š
